title: Great 2 BR downstairs condo with a Community pool in the Northeast!
map_address: 4730 E. Craig Rd. #1126 near Craig and Lamb
posting_body: Great 2 bed/2 bath downstairs condo unit in the Northeast!
Large front living room with a gas fireplace!
Master bedroom has a walk-in closet.
Located in a gated community with a community pool, spa, playground, clubhouse, and exercise room!!
For more information on this property or to set up an appointment to view it, please call Chris at
Please reference the street name 4730 E. CRAIG RD.
